body_content.explanation: the process in plants and animals by which a liquid moves gradually from one part of the body or the plant to another through a membrane (= cell covering):
examples: Fluid flows back into the tiny blood vessels by osmosis.

body_content.explanation: the way in which ideas and information gradually spread between people:
examples: The children were never taught the songs, they just listened to other children singing them and learned them by osmosis.
Reading is not picked up by a process of osmosis, but needs to be taught.
